oepDescription: Cloud-based electronic signature (OEP) is an electronic analog of a handwritten signature, containing necessary data about its owner...
whereToGetOEP: Where and how to get OEP?
oepLocations: You can get OEP at: Population Service Centers (CNS), Business Service Centers (COP), Civil and Digital Education Centers (CGSO), Local Territorial Administrations (LTA), Embassies and Consulates of the Kyrgyz Republic located in other countries...
pepDescription: Simple electronic signature (PEP) is an electronic signature where the signature key matches the electronic signature itself (codes, passwords, and other identifiers)...
esiDescription: Unified identification system (ESI) is an automated system that aggregates identification and authorization methods provided for by the legislation of the Kyrgyz Republic...
